name: UIAttachmentBehavior
desc: A relationship between two dynamic items, or between a dynamic item and an anchor point.

items.name: class func slidingAttachment(with: UIDynamicItem, attachmentAnchor: CGPoint, axisOfTranslation: CGVector) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns an attachment behavior where one item slides along the specified axis.

items.name: class func slidingAttachment(with: UIDynamicItem, attachedTo: UIDynamicItem, attachmentAnchor: CGPoint, axisOfTranslation: CGVector) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns an attachment behavior where two items are fixed to points that slide along the specified axis.

items.name: class func fixedAttachment(with: UIDynamicItem, attachedTo: UIDynamicItem, attachmentAnchor: CGPoint) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns an attachment behavior where the two items are fixed together through the specified anchor point.

items.name: class func limitAttachment(with: UIDynamicItem, offsetFromCenter: UIOffset, attachedTo: UIDynamicItem, offsetFromCenter: UIOffset) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns an attachment behavior object where two items are constrained by a maximum distance from one another.

items.name: class func pinAttachment(with: UIDynamicItem, attachedTo: UIDynamicItem, attachmentAnchor: CGPoint) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns an attachment behavior where the two items are pinned to, and move around, an anchor point

items.name: init(item: UIDynamicItem, attachedToAnchor: CGPoint)
items.desc: Initializes a behavior where the center of a dynamic item is attached to the specified anchor point.

items.name: init(item: UIDynamicItem, attachedTo: UIDynamicItem)
items.desc: Initializes a behavior where the centers of two dynamic items are attached to each other.

items.name: init(item: UIDynamicItem, offsetFromCenter: UIOffset, attachedToAnchor: CGPoint)
items.desc: Initializes a behavior where the specified point in a dynamic item is attached to an anchor point.

items.name: init(item: UIDynamicItem, offsetFromCenter: UIOffset, attachedTo: UIDynamicItem, offsetFromCenter: UIOffset)
items.desc: Initializes an attachment behavior that connects a specified point in one dynamic item to a specified point in another dynamic item.

items.name: var items: [UIDynamicItem]
items.desc: The dynamic items connected by the attachment behavior.

items.name: var anchorPoint: CGPoint
items.desc: The anchor point for the attachment behavior, if any.

items.name: var attachedBehaviorType: UIAttachmentBehavior.AttachmentType
items.desc: The type of the attachment behavior.

items.name: var damping: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of damping to apply to the attachment behavior.

items.name: var frequency: CGFloat
items.desc: The frequency of oscillation for the attachment behavior.

items.name: var length: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance, in points, between the two attachment points of the attachment behavior.

items.name: var frictionTorque: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of force needed to overcome rotational forces around an anchor point.

items.name: var attachmentRange: UIFloatRange
items.desc: The range of motion for the attachment behavior.

items.name: enum UIAttachmentBehavior.AttachmentType
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of the attachment behavior object.

items.name: struct UIFloatRange
items.desc: The range of motion for attached objects.

items.name: struct UIOffset
items.desc: A structure that specifies an amount to offset a position.
